leftSection_2.title: Choose the Right Ajman Mainland License for Your Business with One Nexuz

items.title: Professional License
items.description: Ideal for consultants, IT professionals, freelancers, and service-based companies.

items.title: Commercial License
items.description: For businesses and entrepreneurs that trade, import, export, and engage in wholesale activities without risking compliance.

leftSection_3.title: One Nexuz Unlock The Best Fit Company Structures for Your Ajman Mainland Business
leftSection_3.description: A successful business setup in the Ajman mainland starts with the right infrastructure. Kick off business activities today without the risk of hefty penalties and fines, having One Nexuz by your side.

items.title: Limited Liability Company
items.description: Ideal for SMEs and startups, an LLC offers 100% foreign ownership, flexible visa quotas, and convenient local market access.

items.title: Sole Proprietorship
items.description: Perfect for solopreneurs and consultants, a sole proprietorship provides businesses full ownership and simple compliance.

items.title: Civil Company
items.description: Best for partnerships in professional services, such as doctors or accountants, a civil company requires a UAE national services agent.

items.title: Branch Office
items.description: Ideal for international businesses expanding into Ajman, a branch office enables foreigners to set up subsidiaries within the area.

leftSection_5.title: Our Proven 6-Step Roadmap For Ajman Mainland Business Setup

items.title: Schedule a Free Consultation
items.description: Start with a personalised session where our experts assess your business goals, recommend the most suitable Ajman Mainland location, and advise on the activities that comply with local regulations.

items.title: Select Your Legal Structure
items.description: Choose the appropriate legal entity, register your trade name, and apply for a license that’s tailored to your business model and objectives.

items.title: Set Up a Compliant Workspace
items.description: Arrange a physical office that meets Ajman Mainland requirements (minimum 200 sq. ft.), draft your Memorandum of Association (MOA), or appoint a local sponsor as required by your business structure.

items.title: Prepare Documents & Complete Fees
items.description: Gather and submit all necessary documentation to the Department of Economic Development (DED) and the applicable government and registration fees.

items.title: Obtain Your Trade License
items.description: Receive approvals from the relevant authorities, secure your trade license, open a corporate bank account, and apply for employee visas based on your office capacity.

items.title: Ongoing Support & Compliance
items.description: Rely on our continued assistance with license renewals, visa management, annual audits, and other compliance matters to ensure your Ajman Mainland company operates smoothly.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is the cost of setting up my business in Ajman Mainland?
items.answer: Business setup can vary between AED 8,500 to 20,000, depending on the type of license you select, your business activities, and the number of visas required.

items.question: How long does it take to get my Ajman-based business setup?
items.answer: Generally, it takes 5-7 working days, depending on whether all your documents are compiled and approved.

items.question: Can I, as an expat, own 100% of my company in Ajman Mainland?
items.answer: Yes! Thanks to the updated UAE Commercial Companies Law, foreign investors can now own 100% of their business in mainland sectors.

items.question: Can foreigners sell their goods in Ajman’s local market?
items.answer: Absolutely! The city’s law permits you to sell goods in its local markets, as well as other Emirates.

items.question: Is a physical office a must to set up my Ajman mainland business?
items.answer: Yes, a physical office address is required to apply and register as a mainland company. Our skilled consultants can help you secure an affordable space to ensure compliance without breaking the bank.
